name: ITP - Stainless Steel Pipe Site Welding
template name: ITP - Stainless Steel Pipe Site Welding

name: Inspect all pipe & fittings are correct to job requirements and no signs of damage
Inspect all pipe & fittings are correct to job requirements and no signs of damage
Tack weld 6m lengths into instructed lengths
Setup purge baloons & purge with nitrogen
Tack flanges on spool lengths & check for square
Remove from rollers and move to lay down area
